name: RI_1_1_12_Re_identify_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.12 Re-identify Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Re-Identify Record Entries that were previously de-identified or pseudonymized (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to restore information to data that allows identification of information source and/or information subject. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.12.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to re-identify (or associate original identity with) Record Entry content according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
